mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host(host_id, host_pic, company, uni, write_date, auth_file, content) VALUES( #{hostId}, #{hostPic}, #{company}, #{uni}, sysdate, #{authFile}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE host SET host_pic = #{hostPic}, company = #{company}, uni = #{uni}, write_date = sysdate, auth_file = #{authFile}, content = #{content} WHERE host_id = #{hostId}
mapper.select: SELECT h.host_id, h.company, h.uni, h.write_date, h.content, h.host_value, m.auth, m.email, m.join_date, m.last_conn_date, m.name, m.tel FROM host h, member m WHERE h.host_id = m.member_id AND m.auth = 1
